Managed online endpointsÂ¶

Note

Private preview for this functionality is invite only at this point

Welcome to the private preview for our managed offering for scoring of machine learning models. With this we are announcing a brand-new capability for hosting and scoring online models in the cloud.

Let managed endpoints take care of serving, scaling, securing & monitoring it ML models, freeing you from the overhead of setting up and managing the underlying infrastructure.

In the private preview you can try:

  1. No cluster setup & management overhead: Specify only the VM SKU and scale settings during deployment.

  2. Safe rollout: faulty updates to deployments are contained by default. First class support for blue/green and canary rollouts.

  3. Security: Azure ML token auth (more features will be added in upcoming releases)

  4. Reliability: Node recovery incase of system failure (more features will be added in upcoming releases)

  5. Endpoint monitoring: out of box resource utilization, error and latency metrics integrated with Azure Monitor. Out of box appinsights integration.

  6. Logs: Live tailing of console logs and integration with Azure Monitor logs service
